ReadyToOrderModal.title: Order at the bar!
ReadyToOrderModal.message: Take it easy with your drinks.
ReadyToOrderModal.thankYou: If you feel sick or need help, go to the bar. They will help you.

Story1.text-1: Asian flavors, great drinks and a warm Jaya vibe.
Story1.text-2: Guests arrive curious and leave feeling like friends.
Story1.text-3: Serving Bremen with heart and good food for many years.

Story2.text-1: Yaka Bar turns every night into something unforgettable.
Story2.text-2: Dance to global beats with great DJs each weekend.
Story2.text-3: Tropical drinks and a space you can rent anytime.

Story3.text-1: If something feels off, take it seriously and stay aware.
Story3.text-2: If you see trouble, get help from staff nearby.
Story3.text-3: We look out for each other, so support when you can.

questions.memories: Embark on a Nepalese-Tibetan flavor journey

Feedback.title: Share your feedback

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.description: We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback helps us improve and provide a better dining experience for everyone.
thankYou.disclaimer: We can't respond individually, but we'll pass it on to the teams who are working to help make our restaurant better for everyone.

Feedback.subtitle: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Your input helps us improve your dining experience.
Feedback.ratingQuestion: How would you rate your overall experience?
Feedback.categoryLabel: What would you like to give feedback about?
Feedback.detailsLabel: Tell us more about your experience
Feedback.detailsPlaceholder: Please share specific details about your experience...

validation.minDetails: Please provide at least 2 characters of feedback
